SEARCH

Class Pet

java.lang.Object
Pet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, PetModel
public class Pet extends Object implements PetModel, Serializable
Represents a virtual pet with various attributes and behaviors. This class implements the PetModel interface and Serializable for save/load functionality. The pet has basic attributes like hunger, social interaction, sleep, and health, which affect its overall mood and behavior. The pet can: - Be fed, played with, and put to sleep - Have different personalities (Dog, Cat, Bird) - Generate and collect items in its inventory - Be saved to and loaded from files - Auto-save its state periodically - Die if health reaches zero and be revived The class manages several background tasks through ExecutorServices: - Attribute updates over time - Automatic item generation - Auto-save functionality - Sleep/wake cycle management All attributes are bounded between 0 and 100, and the pet's health decreases when its needs (hunger, social, sleep) are not met.
See Also:
  • PetModel
  • Serializable
  • Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • startTimer

      public void startTimer()
      Initiates a timer for periodic pet status updates. The timer runs every 5 seconds with an initial delay of 3 seconds. If more than 1 second has passed since the last interaction, it triggers attribute updates via the timeSimulator. The timer automatically shuts down if the pet's health reaches zero.

    • setAllowTaskExecution

      public void setAllowTaskExecution()
      Enables task execution for a pet by setting the allowTaskExecution flag to true. This method allows the pet to perform tasks after being called.

    • setHunger

      public void setHunger(int hunger)
      Set the hunger level of the pet.
      Parameters:
      hunger - the hunger level of the pet.

    • setscore

      public void setscore(int score)
      Sets the score for the pet. If the score is less than 0, it will be set to 0. If the score is greater than 100000, it will be set to 100000.
      Parameters:
      score - the score to be set, will be clamped between 0 and 100000

    • setSocial

    • sleep

      public void sleep() throws IllegalStateException
      Puts the pet to sleep for a fixed duration of 10 seconds. The pet will automatically wake up after the sleep period. Updates the last interaction time and changes the pet's sleeping state.
      Specified by:
      sleep in interface PetModel
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the pet is already sleeping

    • startAutoSave

      public void startAutoSave(String slot, long interval, TimeUnit unit)
      Starts an automatic save operation that periodically saves the pet data to the specified slot. If an auto-save operation is already running, it is stopped before starting the new one.
      Parameters:
      slot - The save slot identifier where the pet data will be saved
      interval - The time duration between consecutive auto-saves
      unit - The time unit for the interval (e.g., SECONDS, MINUTES)

    • stopAutoSave

      public void stopAutoSave()
      Stops the automatic save operation.

    • save

      public void save(String slot)
      Save the pet's state to a file.
      Parameters:
      slot - the save slot identifier

      slot - the save slot identifier
      Returns:
      the loaded Pet object
